languages.text: "Мы уже приняли одно сообщение, до того блуждавшее в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериуме{/g}. Господин Заккари Вайс доложил о получении приглашения — Наместник Футфола нижайше просит Вольного Торговца династии фон Валанциус почтить его визитом. Со слов господина Заккари, сообщение "окрашено в тона мольбы", и с его же слов — "похоже, Наместник чрезвычайно жаждет скорейшей встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Мы уже приняли одно сообщение, до того блуждавшее в имматериуме. Господин Заккари Вайс доложил о получении приглашения — Наместник Футфола нижайше просит Вольного Торговца династии фон Валанциус почтить его визитом. Со слов господина Заккари, сообщение "окрашено в тона мольбы", и с его же слов — "похоже, наместник чрезвычайно жаждет скорейшей встречи".

languages.text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"
languages.original_text: "Мы уже приняли одно сообщение, до того блуждавшее в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериуме{/g}. Господин Заккари Вайс доложил о получении приглашения — Наместник Футфола нижайше просит Вольного Торговца династии фон Валанциус почтить его визитом. Со слов господина Заккари, сообщение "окрашено в тона мольбы", и с его же слов — "похоже, Наместник чрезвычайно жаждет скорейшей встречи".

traits.locale_text: "We have already received a message previously floating in the immaterium. Master Zachary Vice has reported receiving an invitation — the Governor of Footfall humbly requests an audience with the Rogue Trader of von Valancius dynasty. According to master Zachary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading'. I quote, 'Apparently the Governor is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

"We have already received a message previously floating in the immaterium. Master Zachary Vice has reported receiving an invitation — the Governor of Footfall humbly requests an audience with the Rogue Trader of von Valancius dynasty. According to master Zachary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading'. I quote, 'Apparently the Governor is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

"We have already received a message previously stranded in the immaterium. Master Zachary Vice has reported receiving an invitation — the Governor of Footfall humbly requests an audience with the Rogue Trader of von Valancius dynasty. According to master Zachary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading'. I quote, 'Apparently the Governor is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

"We have already received a message that was previously adrift in the Immaterium: Master Zacchary Weisz has reported receiving an invitation — the Liege of Footfall humbly requests an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

"We have already received a message that was previously adrift in the Immaterium: Master Zacchary Weisz has reported receiving an invitation — the Liege of Footfall humbly requests an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

"Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

languages.text: «El maestro Zacchary Weisz ha recuperado una invitación que se encontraba a la deriva en el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}: El Señor de Paso solicita humildemente una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius. Según el maestro Zacchary, el mensaje estaba "teñido con toques de súplica". Textualmente, dijo: "Parece que el Señor arde en deseos de reunirse lo antes posible"».
languages.original_text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Zacchary Weisz ha recuperado una invitación que se encontraba a la deriva en el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}: El Señor de Paso solicita humildemente una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius. Según el maestro Zacchary, el mensaje estaba "teñido con toques de súplica". Textualmente, dijo: "Parece que el Señor arde en deseos de reunirse lo antes posible"».

languages.text: “扎卡里·威茨大师找回了之前在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中漂流的邀请函。落脚港的总督谦卑地请求与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人会面。扎卡里大师的原话是这么说的：‘信息中的语调带着恳求的意味。很显然，这里的总督很急于与舰长大人尽快见面。’”
languages.original_text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

traits.locale_text: “扎卡里·威茨大师找回了之前在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中漂流的邀请函。落脚港的总督谦卑地请求与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人会面。扎卡里大师的原话是这么说的：‘信息中的语调带着恳求的意味。很显然，这里的总督很急于与舰长大人尽快见面。’”

languages.text: 「マスター・ザッカリー・ワイズが前に{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}に漂流していた招待状を回収しました―フットフォールの領主ュが、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の自由開拓者との謁見を謹んで要請しております。マスター・ザッカリーによりますと、そのメッセージは『懇願の色を帯びていた』そうです。私に言わせると『リエージュは見るからにできるだけ早く会いたがっている』ですね」
languages.original_text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ザッカリー・ワイズが前に{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}に漂流していた招待状を回収しました―フットフォールの領主ュが、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の自由開拓者との謁見を謹んで要請しております。マスター・ザッカリーによりますと、そのメッセージは『懇願の色を帯びていた』そうです。私に言わせると『リエージュは見るからにできるだけ早く会いたがっている』ですね」

languages.text: "Meister Zacchary Weisz hat eine Einladung wiederhergestellt, die zuvor im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} dahintrieb – der Lehnsherr von Footfall ersucht in aller Demut um eine Audienz {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin} der Dynastie von Valancius. Laut Meister Zacchary hatte die Nachricht einen 'flehenden Unterton'. Ich zitiere: 'Anscheinend ist dem Lehnsherren an einem möglichst baldigen Treffen gelegen.'"
languages.original_text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

traits.locale_text: "Meister Zacchary Weisz hat eine Einladung wiederhergestellt, die zuvor im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} dahintrieb – der Lehnsherr von Footfall ersucht in aller Demut um eine Audienz {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin} der Dynastie von Valancius. Laut Meister Zacchary hatte die Nachricht einen 'flehenden Unterton'. Ich zitiere: 'Anscheinend ist dem Lehnsherren an einem möglichst baldigen Treffen gelegen.'"

languages.text: « De plus, maître Zacchary Weisz a récupéré une invitation qui dérivait dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} : le suzerain de Castel demande humblement une audience avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la dynastie von Valancius. D'après maître Zacchary, son message avait un ton "légèrement suppliant". Je cite : "Il semblerait que le suzerain désire que cette rencontre ait lieu le plus tôt possible." »
languages.original_text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

traits.locale_text: « De plus, maître Zacchary Weisz a récupéré une invitation qui dérivait dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} : le suzerain de Castel demande humblement une audience avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la dynastie von Valancius. D'après maître Zacchary, son message avait un ton "légèrement suppliant". Je cite : "Il semblerait que le suzerain désire que cette rencontre ait lieu le plus tôt possible." »

languages.text: "Üstat Zacchary Weisz, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar'da{/g} başıboş sürüklenen bir davet buldu: Binliman Emîri, von Valancius hanedanlığının Hür Tacir'i ile görüşmek için naçizane bir talepte bulunmuş. Üstat Zacchary'e göre bu mesaj 'yalvarma tonlarındaki nüanslara sahip'. Sözlerini direkt aktarmam gerekirse: 'Galiba bizim Emîr bir an önce görüşebilmek için yanıp tutuşuyor.'"
languages.original_text: "Master Zacchary Weisz has recovered an invitation previously adrift in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} — the Liege of Footfall has humbly requested an audience with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. According to Master Zacchary, the message was 'tinted with shades of pleading.' I quote: 'Apparently the Liege is anxious to meet as soon as possible.'"

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Zacchary Weisz, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar{/g}'da kalmış bir davet buldu: Binliman Emîr'i, von Valancius hanedanlığının Hür Tacir'i ile görüşmek için nazik bir talepte bulunmuş. Üstat Zacchary'e göre bu mesaj 'yalvarma tonlarındaki nüanslara sahip'. Sözlerini direkt aktarmam gerekirse: 'Emîr bir an önce görüşebilmek için yanıp tutuşuyor gibi görünüyor.'"
